name: Orbs (itch) (Antoria, Taïgo, Balstik, Rotagg)
description:
This is a submission for https://itch.io/jam/extrajam3.

This game is all about collecting orbs and growing.

Collect up to 15 orbs per level !

Clear all 10 levels and complete the game !

Have fun bumping against the bumpers, trying to master the wormholes and standing up against the magnets !

--- Controls

Left mouse button to shoot

R to reset

Escape to go back to level selection
